# Instructions Directory

Quick reference guides for specific integrations. Each points to comprehensive documentation in `/docs/`.

## Available Instructions

- **`better-auth.instructions.md`** — Auth patterns (auto-loads for auth-related files)
- **`i18n.instructions.md`** — Internationalization (auto-loads for i18n/locale files)
- **`orpc.instructions.md`** — API procedures (auto-loads for `/src/lib/orpc/` and API routes)
- **`shadcn.instructions.md`** — UI components (auto-loads for `/src/components/ui/`)

## Full Documentation

Comprehensive docs in `/docs/README.md` covering all libraries and features.

## Main Instructions

For all general guidelines, architecture, conventions, and agent rules, see `/.github/copilot-instructions.md`
